name: Ninki Nanka
shortLoreBlurb: Ninki Nanka is a monster from Gambia/Senegal associated with river dragon, fear. Serpents mark thresholds and hidden wisdom. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
overlapsLinks: Fafnir (Norse), Jörmungandr (Norse), Manannán (Celtic), Naga (India/SE Asia), Poseidon (Greek), Quetzalcoatl (Aztec), Tangaroa (Polynesia), Yemaya (Yoruba)
description: Ninki Nanka is a monster from Gambia/Senegal associated with river dragon, fear. Serpents mark thresholds and hidden wisdom. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
